alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 12:28PM MDT until April 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 65 to 75 mph can be expected. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Damaging winds could blow down trees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated snow showers will be possible through this evening. Brief reductions in visibility, slippery roads and blowing snow will occur, as a result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
